title: John Zorn - Filmworks 16 [FLAC]
description:
Filmworks XVI: Workingman's Death

 ZornÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s latest soundtrack is scored for percussion and electronics, and features two masterful musicians who have been working with him consistently since 1981: Cyro Baptista and Ikue Mori. The subject of the film is quite remarkableÃ¢â‚¬â€men who work life-threatening jobsÃ¢â‚¬â€and as the settings jump from Java to China, Nigeria to the Ukraine, so does the music. Steaming sulphur mines, the bloodbaths of a brutal slaughterhouseÃ¢â‚¬Â¦these are just a few of the scenes that are evoked in this unique score that blends dynamic rhythms with ambient soundscapes.

Shanir Ezra Blumenkranz: Bass
